commands.command: CREATE TABLE RepairsTbl ( [RepairID] AUTOINCREMENT, [CustomerID] INT, [ContactName] VARCHAR(50), [ContactEmail] VARCHAR(50), [JobCardNumber] VARCHAR(20), [DateLogged] DateTime, [LastStatusChange] DateTime, [MachineTypeID] INT, [MachineSerialNumber] VARCHAR(50), [SwopOutMachineID] INT, [MachineConditionID] INT, [TakenFrother] YESNO, [TakenBeanLid] YESNO, [TakenWaterLid] YESNO, [BrokenFrother] YESNO, [BrokenBeanLid] YESNO, [BrokenWaterLid] YESNO, [RepairFaultID] INT, [RepairFaultDesc] VARCHAR(255), [RepairStatusID] INT, [RelatedOrderID] INT, [Notes] MEMO, CONSTRAINT [pk_RepairID] PRIMARY KEY (RepairID) )

CREATE TABLE MachineConditionsTbl ( [MachineConditionID] AUTOINCREMENT, [ConditionDesc] VARCHAR(50), [SortOrder] INT, [Notes] MEMO, CONSTRAINT [pk_MachineConditionID] PRIMARY KEY (MachineConditionID) )
CREATE TABLE RepairFaultsTbl ( [RepairFaultID] AUTOINCREMENT, [RepairFaultDesc] VARCHAR(50), [SortOrder] INT, [Notes] MEMO, CONSTRAINT [pk_RepairFaultID] PRIMARY KEY (RepairFaultID) )

CREATE TABLE RepairStatusesTbl ( [RepairStatusID] AUTOINCREMENT, [RepairStatusDesc] VARCHAR(50), [EmailClient] YESNO, [SortOrder] INT, [Notes] MEMO, CONSTRAINT [pk_RepairStatusID] PRIMARY KEY (RepairStatusID) )
